ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.2_0: At that time the nuns gave the full admission to one year.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.3_0: when the nuns’ dwelling place still doesn’t have sufficient capacity?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.5_0: “How can nuns give the full admission to one year?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.6_0: when the nuns’ dwelling place still doesn’t have sufficient capacity?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.7_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.8_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.9_0: “How can nuns give the full admission to one year?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.10_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.14_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.15_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.16.1_0: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to two women in one year, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.7_0: Gives the full admission to two women:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.8_0: gives the full ordination to two women.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.9_0: If, intending to give the full admission to two women, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastic boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.10_0: After the motion, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.11_0: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.12_0: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.13_0: and the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.2.2_0: if she gives the full admission to one woman every other year;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.2.4_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.2.5_0: The training rule on the observance day, is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.2.6_0: The eighth sub-chapter on unmarried girls is finished.
